title: Uttarakhand CM seeks Centre's nod for 21 new hydro electricity power projects of 2123 MW
description: Uttarakhand CM Pushkar Dhami noted 40% hydroelectric capacity use, seeking 21 new hydel projects (2123 MW) approval from Union Minister Khattar, who reviewed Tehri Complex and urban projects. Projects on the Alaknanda, Bhagirathi rivers; experts recommended. Dhami met Khattar at residence; Jal Shakti ministries to discuss in Delhi, positive steps to follow.
